spaṣṭe hi śuktikā rajatayoḥ bheda avasāyini pramāṇe
sādṛśyāt bheda anavabādhāt abheda pratītiḥ iti kalpyate

original: śabde tu na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ pratyuccāraṇaṃ bhedaḥ /
analyzed: śabde tu na pratyakṣa siddhaḥ pratyuccāraṇam bhedaḥ
katham na siddhaḥ
nanu mahat tva alpa tvābhyām vibhinnaḥ varṇaḥ upalabhyate
na etat evam
mahattva alpatve pratiyataḥ pi

original: varṇapratīte mahattvā-lpatve eva bhinne avabhātaḥ, na varṇāḥ /
analyzed: varṇa pratīte mahat tva alpa tve eva bhinne avabhātaḥ na varṇāḥ

original: na vā'numānenāpi bhedo 'vagantuṃ śakyata iti prāgeva niveditam /
analyzed: na vā anumānena api bhedaḥ vagantum śakyate iti prāk eva niveditam
atas bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt
abhinnaḥ eva ayam bhinna avabhāsaḥ iti
sākṣāt pratīti balanā eva avasthāpitam
nanu ca tad graha balena eva anumānam nirastam
niraste ca anumāne
tad grahe iti itaretarāśrayam iti
tatra āha anumāna nirāsena prasādhyate
svayam pratīti siddha tvāt bhrānti śaṅkā tu vāryate
bheda agraha nibandhanā iyam bhrāntiḥ iti śaṅkā kevala anumāna nirāsena apanīyate
pratīti bala siddhaḥ tu tad grahaḥ na kāraṇa antaram apekṣate iti
katham itaretara āśraya tā

original: nanu kimiti tadgrahabalājjvālāyāmapi bhedānumānaṃ na nirākriyataityata āha--- jvālābhedaṃ vinā 998bhāsāṃ vitatirnopapadyate /
analyzed: nanu kim iti tad graha balāt jvālāyām api bheda anumānam na nirākriyate eti atas āha jvālā bhedam vinā vitatiḥ nā upapadyate
bheda ajñānena sādṛśyāt pratyabhijñā tu yujyate
avayavī jvālā
sarvaḥ ca avayavī sva avayava saṃyogena jātaḥ
tad vināśena vinaśyati
tantu vyatiṣaṅga janitaḥ hi paṭaḥ tantu vibhāge vināśī dṛśyate
ca gṛha udara ādi vartinī taijasam rūpam

original: na ca dravyāśritā rūpādayo dravyaṃ virahayya vartante /
analyzed: na ca dravya āśritāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ dravyam virahayya vartante
tena taijasāḥ paramāṇavaḥ nityam abhibhūta tvāt anupalambhamānaḥ api
pratyakṣatas yāvat prabhāvi tati sannidhīyante iti aṅgīkaraṇīyam
teṣu ca deśa antaram anuprāpteṣu etat āśrayaṇīyam eteṣām saṃyogāḥ vighaṭante iti
vighaṭiteṣu teṣu
tad ārabdhe dravye nāśam upeyuṣi
jvālā antara darśanam antareṇa na upapadyate
bheda agrahaṇa nibandhanā tu pratyabhijñā bhrāntiḥ śukti rajata ādiṣu dṛṣṭa tvāt upapannā
vinā tu śabdebhedena na kiñcid nā upapadyate
uktena nīti mārgeṇa sammataḥ
pratyuccāraṇam bheda vyatirekeṇa api prayatna anantara upalabhyamāna tvam yathā upapadyate
tathā uktam eva iti
apratipakṣā pratyabhijñā
tasmāt śabdasya nitya tā
hi nitya tvam vyoma ādiṣu api sammatam
śabdasya prayatnaḥ eva kāraṇa tayā sambhāvitaḥ
sa ca pratyabhijñā balena dvijīya ādi darśaneṣu abhivyañjaka tām āpāditaḥ iti
prathama darśaṃne pi asau abhivyañjakaḥ eva
atas sattvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ gagana ādi vat
na asya anitya tā iti
eṣā śālika nāthena śabda nitya tva sādhanī

original: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ nyāyaśuddhirnāma navamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam1006 //
analyzed: iti mahā mahā upādhyāya śrī śālikanāthamiśra praṇītāyām prakaraṇa pañcikāyām nyāyaśuddhiḥ nāma navamam prakaraṇam
